metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12468 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An Incorrect Access Control vulnerability was found in Wikimedia MediaWiki 1.27.0 through 1.32.1. Directly POSTing to Special:ChangeEmail would allow for bypassing re-authentication, allowing for potential account takeover.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12468` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
